protein.specific_function: Plays a role in signal transduction by regulating the intracellular concentration of cyclic nucleotides. This phosphodiesterase catalyzes the specific hydrolysis of cGMP to 5'-GMP.

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on ester bonds
negative regulation of cardiac muscle contraction
negative regulation of T cell proliferation
positive regulation of cardiac muscle hypertrophy
positive regulation of chronic inflammatory response
positive regulation of MAP kinase activity
regulation of the force of heart contraction
